content: Colin Cooper | King's College London Skip to main contentProfessor Colin Cooper Emeritus Professor of Theoretical Computer ScienceResearch interestsComputer scienceContact detailscolin.cooper@kcl.ac.ukBiographyAbout Received Royal Society funding for work on Random Walks, Interacting Particles, Faster Network Exploration (2010-2012) EPSRC project Random walks on computer networks Samsung Global Research Outreach (GRO)  project Fast low-cost methods to learn structure of  large networks.
